basic.color: Flower color red, fruit color gray green

maintenance.watering: Keep soil moisture high constantly, grows well unless in saturated water for a long time
maintenance.fertilization: Use diluted manure added with Calcium superphosphate as base fertilizer, apply ervery half month, during peak growth stages, top-dressing with compound fertilizers once every half month or apply foliar fertilizers
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
